title: Best ad campaigns worldwide 2018
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Campaign/Brand (Agency), and Number of points in each Campaign/Brand (Agency) on the y axis.

The maximum Number of points 75.2 is found at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) and the minimum is found at Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) where Campaign/Brand (Agency) is 44.0.

The Number of points of Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) is 1.71% larger than the minimum value at Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York).
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Campaign/Brand (Agency) in the x axis and Number of points in the y axis.

The maximum Number of points 75.2 is found at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) and the minimum is found at Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) where Campaign/Brand (Agency) is 44.0.

The maximum Number of points 75.2 is found at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) and the minimum is found at Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) where Campaign/Brand (Agency) is 44.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of points for 10 number of Campaign/Brand (Agency)s.

The Number of points is highest at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) and lowest at Campaign/Brand (Agency) Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York).
The difference of Number of points between the highest and lowest Campaign/Brand (Agency) is 31.2.

The Campaign/Brand (Agency) Let's make viral products instead! /Carvaan (the Womb Mumbai) has the highest Number of points, followed by Healthy Hands Chalk Sticks / Savlon (Ogilvy Mumbai), and India's Newest Status Symbol / Harpic (McCann New Delhi). Down to the Campaign/Brand (Agency) Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) which is the lowest.
The Campaign/Brand (Agency) Original is Never Finished / adidas Originals (Johannes Leonardo New York) tends to be 1.32 percent lower than average.
